response.overview: An old VHS tape shows the mysterious, disjointed broadcast of an unknown blonde girl materializing from the trees. From their hunger, she discovers she too has violent appetites, leading her down a path of monstrous consequences that the town and its people around her are forced to reconcile with.
response.tagline: For a week straight during the 1980s, a mysterious broadcast aired every night at 1:00 AM. Those who have come forward claimed it showed the birth of evil... in the shape of a girl.
response.title: A Girl Emerges
